measure.CatchLine: Provides a safe harbor for certain local regulations governing camping on public property against the cause of action otherwise available to challenge the objective reasonableness of such regulations.
measure.MeasureSummary:
Digest: The Act would set up a safe harbor against suit for city or county laws that set stated limits on camping on public property. (Flesch Readability Score: 62.6). 
	Provides a safe harbor for certain local regulations governing camping on public property against the cause of action otherwise available to challenge the objective reasonableness of such regulations. 
	Declares an emergency, effective on passage.
measure.RelatingToFull: Relating to the regulation of public property with respect to persons experiencing homelessness; amending ORS 195.530; and declaring an emergency.
measure.RelatingTo: Relating to the regulation of public property with respect to persons experiencing homelessness; declaring an emergency.
measure.FiscalImpact: May have fiscal impact, but no statement yet issued
measure.RevenueImpact: May have revenue impact, but no statement yet issued

historyActions.ActionText: First reading. Referred to Speaker's desk.
